review: The box is lovely and easy to use, easy to set up. I agree with all the other glowing comments about the box itself. But searching for Prime movies and tv is very difficult. For the highly rated tv shows, they give you a come-on with an introduction or even the first episode for free, then charge quite a bit for additional episodes. It feels like bait and switch! I have to look up things I want to watch on the computer, then see if they're going to charge me for it. Not what I expected. Very disappointed in this aspect.
